EmailTemplate.subject: Link existing storage with HDFS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
I’m on the Pivotal team that supports {{company.Company Name:default=enterprise companies}} and was curious if you had any challenges linking existing storage systems with your Hadoop HDFS?
Because this is a common challenge for our customers, I wanted to invite you to a webinar <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar> that will introduce how Pivotal can help you leverage your existing data infrastructure investments with HDFS.
Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop - Tuesday, 7/15 @ 9AM PDT. Register today <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar> for this technical preview on how to add extensibility into Hadoop.
If you’re not able to make the webinar but just have some questions please shoot me a line I’ll do my best to help.
-Estevan
Estevan McCalley | Account Manager Direct: 512-568-3753 | emccalley@gopivotal.com <mailto:emccalley@gopivotal.com>
